title: TornEngine.com
desc: A Website: A collection of tools for Torn.com

title: byrod.cc
desc:
A URL shortener: A URL shortener for Torn.com. Usage:
  • byrod.cc/p/[player id] to link to a profile
  • byrod.cc/s/[player id] to link to personalstats
  • byrod.cc/a/[player id] to link to attack
  • byrod.cc/f/[faction id] to link to a faction
  • byrod.cc/c/[company id] to link to a company
  • byrod.cc/oc/[oc id] to link to an organised crime
